I am currently working as a consultant in __*Biostatistics*__ in the field of genetics, *i.e.*, proteomics, metabolomics, transcriptomics, *etc.* in Lille & Paris, France.  
Additionally, I am also a __*freelance*__, available for hire to work on __*{{< iconify fa7-brands:r-project title="R" label="R" >}} and Quarto related projects*__.  
I have developed a few {{< iconify fa7-brands:r-project title="R" label="R" >}}&nbsp;packages (_e.g._,&nbsp;[insane](https://github.com/mcanouil/insane), [NACHO](https://github.com/mcanouil/NACHO)), and although some are not very useful, they are most definitely entertaining (_i.e._,&nbsp;[ggpacman](https://github.com/mcanouil/ggpacman)).  
I also enjoy watching movies (![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mcanouil/imdb-ratings/main/media/imdb.svg){fig-alt="Movies seen count"}) and playing with {{< iconify fa7-brands:r-project title="R" label="R" >}} ([github.com/mcanouil/imdb-ratings](https://github.com/mcanouil/imdb-ratings)).

Have a look at my complete [_{{< iconify fa7-regular file-lines title="File Icon" label="File Icon" >}} curriculum vitae_](https://m.canouil.dev/curriculum-vitae/).
